alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Crane; Ector; Ward; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 9:23PM CST until February 16 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CST FOR ECTOR...SOUTHEASTERN ANDREWS...NORTHEASTERN WARD...SOUTHEASTERN WINKLER AND NORTHWESTERN CRANE COUNTIES... At 922 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Odessa, moving east at 35 mph. Blowing dust is also expected. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Odessa, Andrews, Monahans, Thorntonville, Goldsmith, West Odessa, Roy Hurd Memorial Airport, Monahans Sandhills State Park, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Notrees, Penwell, Pleasant Farms and Andrews County Airport. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 77 and 119. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
